attributes.action: support the expansion of, and need to seek an alternative home for the Geneva Conventions.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
International Committee of the Red Cross (ICRC) - Comité international de la Croix-Rouge (CICR) has failed to protect civilians in Afghanistan, Iraq, Lebanon, Sudan and other conflict areas of the world. They have failed to enforce the 3rd and 4th Conventions as set-out in 1949, in addition, they have failed to enforce the 1977 additional 1st and 2nd Protocols in their entirety. 

GCs should be amended to provide for appropriate enforcement a la Torture and extraordinary rendition Conventions.

It is time for us to rethink the role of the ICRC as the sponsors and guardians of the Geneva Conventions and seek an alternative body to enforce the Conventions and additional Protocols.
